title: OLE777Official
author: OLE777Official
created_time: November 24, 2022, 03:36:50 AMLast edit: December 06, 2022, 10:01:00 AM by OLE777Official
content: OLE777The Fastest-Growing Crypto Casino & Sports Betting PlatformHello, I am Carlos and I will be willing to answer some of your questions in relation to any OLE777 promotions and roadmap initiatives. Thank you so much!

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Welcome to forum,I see your casino have decent UI/UX and many good game selections, however you still don't have any gambling license and have mandatory KYC rule on your TOS. Your announcement looks poor since it's full of words and doesn't have proper announcement, I advice to hire a graphic designer to design your ANN thread and you need to bought copper membership [1] in order to attach image since you're still a newbie.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.it would be useful and it would help with transparency (since you are new around here) if you provided a summary of the conditions of these bonuses you are offering to us and whether these are bonuses are valid during a limited time and specify how long these will last.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I thought the appearance of your website uses a white theme but in the game it uses a dark and shady colored theme, it looks like you need to seriously promote your website on this forum to get traffic from forum users to play at your casino, listen to suggestions from friends on the forum in this thread later to make this thread even better with image designs that are more interesting to the public, BTW welcome to the forumQuote from: OLE777Official on November 24, 2022, 03:36:50 AMOne of the first - Online Casino Using Cryptocurrency.unfortunately you are not the first casino to use cryptocurrency, you may need to look at other casinos that are already active on this forum even older than your casino

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: Your ANN presentation is bad just like some of the posters above pointed out op. Simple text and no direct link to the site you are advertising is silly and unprofessional. Couldn't access the site since it just kept loading.First impressions of your site are clearly bad and you need to work a lot harder to resolve all of these issues asap op.

comments.author: OLE777Official
comments.body: Thank you for your feedback and to everyone else in this thread. We do not mean any harm or negativity. We want to be transparent. This thread was supposed to be a test if we are able to post or not. As sometimes there seems to be an IP ban imposed.Our next move is to acquire a Copper Membership and to attach visual assets our designers have created for us and edit the post in this thread to address our message clearer and in a much more professional manner.We were not ready nor anticipated the technicalities of this forum, for that we also thank you.Our sincerest apologies,OLE777 Team.

comments.author: Sims25
comments.body: Good luck with your site but you have to improve the ANN.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and of course it's nice to see that more and more gambling platforms accept cryptocurrencies, including bitcoin, if only it doesn't turn out to be just an online casino by WC 2022, I hope this won't interfere with development. However, I got confused in what year the story of ole777 begins, whose branch it apparently is ole7.io so on the website https://ole777.com / it says that the casino was created more than 10 years ago and according to https://www.whois.com/whois/ole777.com the domain launch year 2010 is visible, however, in https://ole7.io/en/#/account/about-us it is said that OLE777 was created in 2014.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. As they have said you do have poor announcement thread and in my opinion, I didn't read about about the site and instead of just sharing the link of the mechanic then there should be the main link of the site like the home page and what it is about. The link is provided before on what to do to be able to post images which you have to pay in order for your restriction to be removed or you can choose not to pay but you must have to gain activity points and 1 merit. Good luck with your promotion.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Probably the people behind has been involved with online casino's before. Anyhow, welcome to the community, and so we have another one, makes it more exciting for us to see another online casino, niche is very competitive but for sure there are a lot of gamblers here that might test your site.I would also agree that it has a decent UI. Yes a copper membership might do the trick for you to be able to attach image in your post or ANN thread to make it very professional. As gamblers here look for that one and see how you are going to promote and market your business here in the forum. Best of luck!!
